title: Latest Adverse News on J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC
reasoning: Multiple regulatory challenges faced by J.P. Morgan Securities PLC.
news:
1. [J.P. Morgan to Pay $150M to Settle Slew of SEC Charges - Wealth Management](https://www.wealthmanagement.com/regulation-compliance/j-p-morgan-to-pay-150m-to-settle-slew-of-sec-charges) - J.P. Morgan will pay more than $150 million between its investment management and securities arms to settle a myriad of SEC charges. 
2. [SEC.gov | JP Morgan Affiliates to Pay $151 Million to Resolve SEC Charges](https://www.sec.gov/newsroom/press-releases/2024-178) - The Securities and Exchange Commission charged J.P. Morgan Securities LLC and J.P. Morgan Investment Management Inc. for multiple failures including misleading disclosures. 
3. [JP Morgan to Pay $151 Million Over Major Disclosure Failures - Stock Law](https://www.stocklaw.com/securities-fraud-blog/2024/december/jp-morgan-to-pay-151-million-over-major-disclosu/) - JP Morgan agreed to pay $151 million to settle SEC charges alleging misleading disclosures and breach of fiduciary duty. 
4. [CFTC Orders J.P. Morgan to Pay $200m for Supervision Errors - Markets Media](https://www.marketsmedia.com/cftc-orders-j-p-morgan-to-pay-200m-for-supervision-failures/) - The Commodity Futures Trading Commission issued an order against J.P. Morgan Securities LLC for failing to supervise its business effectively. 
5. [J.P. Morgan Fined $3M for Misreporting 77 Billion Shares - Yahoo Finance](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/j-p-morgan-fined-3m-110917606.html) - J.P. Morgan Securities was fined over short interest errors, leading to enhanced policies to resolve the issue.
